summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to low-income housing in the South Lake Union neighborhood and vicinity, transferring part of the proceeds from the sale of City-owned parcels in the South Lake Union area to a new South Lake Union Subfund within the Low Income Housing Fund; requiring the Subfund's display within the City's budget; increasing appropriations to the Office of Housing in the 2002 Budget; authorizing the Housing Director to make loans from the funds appropriated; and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Community Development
